import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";// Initial state for the cart slice
var initialState={products:[]};// Create a cart slice using createSlice
export var cartSlice=createSlice({name:"cart",// Name of the slice
initialState:initialState,// Initial state defined above
reducers:{// Reducer to add items to the cart
addToCart:function addToCart(state,action){// Check if the item is already in the cart
var item=state.products.find(function(item){return item.id===action.payload.id;});if(item){// If the item is already in the cart, update the quantity
item.quantity+=action.payload.quantity;}else{// If the item is not in the cart, add it
state.products.push(action.payload);}},// Reducer to remove an item from the cart
removeItem:function removeItem(state,action){// Filter out the item with the specified ID
state.products=state.products.filter(function(item){return item.id!==action.payload;});},// Reducer to reset the cart to an empty state
resetCart:function resetCart(state){state.products=[];}}});// Export individual action creators generated by createSlice
var _cartSlice$actions=cartSlice.actions,addToCart=_cartSlice$actions.addToCart,removeItem=_cartSlice$actions.removeItem,resetCart=_cartSlice$actions.resetCart;// Export the reducer function generated by createSlice
export{addToCart,removeItem,resetCart};export default cartSlice.reducer;
